alert.note: Alert for Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 09 at 2:56PM CDT until May 14 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central Texas and southeast Texas, including the following areas, in south central Texas, Coastal Jackson and Inland Jackson. In southeast Texas, Coastal Matagorda, Inland Matagorda and Matagorda Islands. * WHEN...Through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
